text:
4⃣ Does lemon & turmeric prevent #COVIDー19?

A: There is no scientific evidence that lemon/turmeric🍋prevents COVID-19. In general, however, WHO recommends consuming adequate fruit and vegetable as part of a healthy diet.

#coronavirus https://t.co/WHvAvvc2U2
